text: Bogdan Sorin Stancu (born on 28 June 1987 in Pitești, Romania) is a Romanian association football forward and left winger who currently plays for the Turkish club Gençlerbirliği and the Romania national football team. His nickname is Motanul (meaning Tomcat). (Romanian) He also previously played for Argeș Pitești, CS Mioveni, Unirea Urziceni, Steaua București, Galatasaray and Orduspor. == Career statistics == Club Season League Cup Europe Other Total Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals FC Argeș 2005–06 7 0 – – – – – – 7 0 Total 7 0 – – – – – – 7 0 Dacia Mioveni 2005–06 12 3 – – – – – – 12 3 Total 12 3 – – – – – – 12 3 Unirea Urziceni 2006–07 20 5 2 0 – – – – 22 5 2007–08 29 6 2 0 – – – – 31 6 Total 49 11 4 0 – – – – 53 11 Steaua 2008–09 29 11 1 0 5 0 – – 35 11 2009–10 25 8 1 0 9 6 – – 35 14 2010–11 18 13 1 0 8 3 – – 27 16 Total 72 32 3 0 22 9 – – 97 41 Galatasaray 2010–11 14 2 2 1 – – – – 16 3 Total 14 2 2 1 – – – – 16 3 Orduspor 2011–12 31 10 1 0 – – 1 0 33 10 2012–13 30 10 3 1 – – – – 33 11 Total 61 20 4 1 – – 1 0 66 21 Gençlerbirliği 2013–14 28 13 – – – – – – 28 13 2014–15 24 9 3 1 – – – – 27 10 2015–16 27 10 1 0 – – – – 28 10 Total 79 32 4 1 – – – – 83 33 Career total 294 100 167 3 22 9 1 0 334 112 === International goals === These goals are current since the game against Switzerland. #
